No description given.

GUARDIAN

Allied characters can use the Bastion for hard cover.

FRIENDLY INTERDICTION

The Bastion and one allied character adjacent to it gain Resistance to all damage dealt by one character within line of sight. The Bastion may choose a new allied character or target as a protocol. The allied character loses Resistance if they break adjacency.

NEAR-THREAT DENIAL SYSTEM

When characters within range 3 attack the Bastion, they take {2/3/4} AP Explosive damage before rolling.

SIEGE GUARDIAN

Allied characters gain Resistance to damage from Blast, Burst, Line, and Cone attacks while they’re adjacent to the Bastion.

DEATHCOUNTER

The first time the Bastion is successfully hit by a ranged or melee attack each round, all damage is reduced to 0.

FEARLESS DEFENDER

Trigger:An allied character in range 5 of the Bastion takes damage, and the Bastion isn’t Immobilized, Slowed, Stunned or otherwise cannot move.
The Bastion can move to an adjacent space and take the damage instead.

PIRATE

DEADLY

The Pirate deals +1d6 bonus damage on critical hits.

PIRATE SYSTEMS AND TRAITS

When choosing optional systems, the Pirate can also choose from the Pirate Systems and Traits list.
